</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Timeline for Removal</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>After 6 months the clear aligner will be removed and the retainer can be given to use for sometime</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li></ul>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_column one_half llm_wd_right_b_box">

<div id="cmsms_heading_6400e377ce6c24_36099893" class="cmsms_heading_wrap cmsms_heading_align_center">
	<h1 class="cmsms_heading llm_wd_list_text">TIPS FOR CLEAR ALIGNER BRACES</h1>
</div> 
<ul id="cmsms_icon_list_items_6400e377ce6e53_42924991" class="cmsms_icon_list_items cmsms_icon_list_type_block cmsms_icon_list_pos_left cmsms_color_type_border llm_wd_list_text"><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e377ce7294_43776337" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Stain Free Clear Aligner Braces</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>To get stain free clear aligner braces follow our guide lines for eating and drinking</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e377ce7551_14062351" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Maintain the Oral Hygiene</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Maintain the oral hygiene after meal and use brush and floss before putting the clear aligners back</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e377ce77e1_51967652" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Cleaning the Clear Aligner</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Keep the clear aligner clean everyday with tooth brush or solution</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e377ce7a37_14012134" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Protect the Clear Aligner</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Protect the clear aligner in a box specially when it is not in use and clean it before wearing it</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e377ce7c91_38380784" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">How to Wear the Clear Aligner Braces</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Keep in mind the guide lines for wearing the clear aligner braces. Use the enough force and pressure with fingers to align and fix the clear aligners braces on both sides of molars</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e377ce7f07_95951830" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">How to Remove the Clear Aligner Braces</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>To remove the clear aligner follows the exact guide lines given by doctor. Gradually remove the braces from back side then softly move towards front. Do not use force or harshly detachment of clear aligner braces.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li><li id="cmsms_icon_list_item_6400e377ce8173_57897235" class="cmsms_icon_list_item">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_inner">
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_icon_wrap">
<span class="cmsms_icon_list_icon cmsms-icon-check-3"></span>
</div>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_content">
<h4 class="cmsms_icon_list_item_title">Feel Discomfort</h4>
<div class="cmsms_icon_list_item_text">
<p>Contact immediately If you feel discomfort or having any other serious problem</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li></ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
